TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供以物件形式查詢和使用實體 (Entity) 資料的機能。

span.span: Provides facilities for querying and working with entity data as objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別不具備執行緒安全。The class is not thread safe. 中的資料物件的完整性無法確保在多執行緒案例中。The integrity of data objects in an cannot be ensured in multithreaded scenarios. 類別是做為概念模型中定義的實體類型的執行個體的物件與資料互動的主要類別。The class is the primary class for interacting with data as objects that are instances of entity types that are defined in a conceptual model. 類別的執行個體會封裝下列項目：An instance of the class encapsulates the following: - 資料庫的連接 (以 物件的形式)。A connection to the database, in the form of an object. - 描述模型的中繼資料 (以 物件的形式)。Metadata that describes the model, in the form of a object. - 管理保存在快取中之物件的 物件。An object that manages objects persisted in the cache. 當 Entity Data Model 工具產生物件層代表概念模型時，此類別代表模型衍生自。When the object layer that represents a conceptual model is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the class that represents the for the model is derived from the . ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例將示範如何建構 。The example shows you how to construct an . summary.span: 接受對物件內容中之物件所做的所有變更。

span.span: Accepts all changes made to objects in the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接受在 中針對所有相關聯項目所做的變更，所以其結果狀態是未變更或已中斷連結。Accepts the changes on all associated entries in the so their resultant state is either unchanged or detached. 這個方法會逐一查看 內部所有「已加入」或「已修改」的 物件，然後將項目的狀態設定為「未變更」。This method iterates all the objects within the that are Added or Modified, and then sets the state of the entry to Unchanged. 「已刪除」的項目會成為已中斷連結。The Deleted items become detached. 如果方法呼叫和未指定，使用者必須先呼叫方法。If the method was called and the was not specified, the user must call the method. 方法在交易已失敗而且使用者想要重試的案例中很有用。The method is useful in the scenario where a transaction has failed and a user wants to retry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在 上呼叫 ，以便將此物件加入至物件內容。Call on the to add the object to the object context. 請於此物件為新物件 (還不在資料來源中) 時執行此動作。Do this when the object is a new object that does not yet exist in the data source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 物件會加入至處於 、 或 狀態中的 。Objects are added to the in the , or state. 當您建立與物件內容中另一個物件相關的新物件時，請使用下列其中一種方法來加入此物件：When you create a new object that is related to another object in the object context, add the object by using one of the following methods: - 針對 呼叫 方法並指定相關物件。Call the method on the and specify the related object. 請針對一對多關聯性 (One-To-Many Relationship) 或多對多關聯性 (Many-To-Many Relationship) 進行此步驟。Do this for a one-to-many or many-to-many relationship. - 將 的 屬性設定為相關物件。Set the property of the to the related object. 請針對一對一關聯性 (One-To-One Relationship) 或多對一關聯性 (Many-To-One Relationship) 進行此步驟。Do this for a one-to-one or many-to-one relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建立、 新增、 修改和刪除物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1)。For more information, see [Creating, Adding, Modifying, and Deleting Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f76f1fad-c553-4b59-820b-89b3dec2fad1). 如果物件處於已卸離的狀態不可以有。If the object is in a detached state it must not have an . 規則`entitySetName`格式如下：The rules for the `entitySetName` format are as follows: - 如果屬性是`null`，然後在`entitySetName`必須是完整限定為在*\<實體容器名稱 >*。*\<實體集名稱 >*。If the property is `null`, then the `entitySetName` has to be fully qualified as in *\*.*\*. - 如果不`null`，然後在`entitySetName`可以是*\<實體容器名稱 >*。*\<實體集名稱 >*或*\<實體集名稱 >*。If is not `null`, then the `entitySetName` can be either *\*.*\* or *\*. 如果`object`具有和`entitySetName`具有值，然後在實體的索引鍵必須符合，找不到根據`entitySetName`和實體容器名稱。If the `object` has an and `entitySetName` has a value, then the of the entity key must match the that was found based on the `entitySetName` and entity container name. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會加入新的產品，並將變更儲存到資料庫。The example adds a new product and saves the changes to the database. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將外之物件所做的變更套用，例如 Web 服務接收的中斷連結物件。The method is used to apply changes that were made to objects outside the , such as detached objects that are received by a Web service. 此方法將純量值從提供的物件複製到中的物件中具有相同索引鍵。The method copies the scalar values from the supplied object into the object in the that has the same key. 您可以使用的資料來源擷取這個物件的執行個體中斷連結的物件。You can use the of the detached object to retrieve an instance of this object from the data source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 傳回特定的物件使用其索引鍵](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e9902af-29b0-4e5d-92db-03dfe6ec49bd)。For more information, see [How to: Return a Specific Object Using its Key](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2e9902af-29b0-4e5d-92db-03dfe6ec49bd). 任何物件的原始值不同的值會標示為已修改。Any values that differ from the original values of the object are marked as modified. 請注意，相關物件的方法不適的目前值`currentEntity`。Note, the method does not apply the current values to the related objects of `currentEntity`. 如果您有目前值的圖形，並想要套用的原始值，呼叫方法。If you have a graph with the current values and want to apply the original values, call method. 您也可以使用的或方法。You may also use the of the or method of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建置多層式架構應用程式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9439d2ba-6b5f-44e8-be65-8a442d922cbb)。For more information, see [Building N-Tier Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9439d2ba-6b5f-44e8-be65-8a442d922cbb).

summary.span: 將已中斷連結物件中的屬性變更套用至已經附加至物件內容的物件。

span.span: Applies property changes from a detached object to an object already attached to the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來將已修改且已中斷連結版本之物件中的屬性變更套用至附加至 的原始版本。The method is used to apply property changes from a modified, detached version of an object to the original version attached to the . 這會支援 Web 服務等案例，其中實體物件已中斷連結並且傳送至進行屬性更新的遠端應用程式。This supports scenarios, such as Web services, where an entity object is detached and sent to a remote application where property updates are made. 這個方法可讓您更輕鬆地將這些變更套用回原始物件。This method enables you to more easily apply these changes back to the original object. 在 之後，此物件會處於 狀態中。After , the object is in the state. 您必須呼叫 方法來更新資料來源。You must call the method to update the data source. 原始物件必須存在 中，而且必須處於 或 狀態中。The original object must exist in the and must be in the or state. 如果已修改之屬性中的，只會修改原始物件`changed`物件。The original object is only modified if there are modified properties in the `changed` object. 提供之物件的 屬性必須設定為有效的 。The property of the supplied object must be set to a valid . 不會影響導覽屬性或相關物件。 does not affect navigation properties or related objects. 只會針對此型別設定存在實體中繼資料中的屬性。 only sets properties that exist in the entity metadata for the type. 例如，加入部分類別中的屬性就不會包含在 作業中。For example, properties that are added in a partial class are not included in the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在 上呼叫 ，以便將此物件附加到物件內容。Call on the to attach the object to the object context. 請於此物件已經在資料來源中但目前未附加到此內容時執行此動作。Do this when the object already exists in the data source but is currently not attached to the context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af6f07ce-2261-4c65-87cf-d018ad082921)。For more information, see [Customizing Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af6f07ce-2261-4c65-87cf-d018ad082921). 是用來附加物件或物件圖形中的最上層物件。 is used to attach an object or the top-level object in an object graph. 所附加的物件必須實作 來公開 (Expose) 。The object being attached must implement to expose an . 所有產生的實體類別都會實作 。All generated entity classes implement . 當您附加的相關的物件時，您也必須呼叫`Attach`上或定義關聯性。When you attach related objects, you must also call `Attach` on the or the to define the relationship. 這個方法會呼叫 方法。This method calls the method. 下列考量適用於附加物件時：The following considerations apply when attaching objects: - 如果所附加的物件有相關物件，這些物件也會附加到物件內容。If the object being attached has related objects, those objects will also be attached to the object context. - 物件會加入至處於未變更狀態中的物件內容。Objects are added to the object context in an unchanged state. - 傳遞給 方法的物件必須具有有效的 值。The object that is passed to the method must have a valid value. 如果此物件的 值無效，請使用 方法來指定實體集的名稱。If the object does not have a valid value, use the method to specify the name of the entity set. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 在這個範例中，我們將附加兩個物件，然後定義其關聯性。In this example, two objects are attached and then the relationship is defined. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AttachRelatedObjects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#attachrelatedobjects)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#AttachRelatedObjects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#attachrelatedobjects)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫上來將物件附加至物件內容中設定的特定實體或如果物件具有`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)值。Call on the to attach the object to a specific entity set in the object context or if the object has a `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 所附加的物件可以是單一物件或圖形的一部分。The object being attached can be a single object or be part of the graph. 規則`entitySetName`格式如下：The rules for the `entitySetName` format are as follows: - 如果屬性是`null`，然後在`entitySetName`必須是完整限定為在*\<實體容器名稱 >*。*\<實體集名稱 >*。If the property is `null`, then the `entitySetName` has to be fully qualified as in *\*.*\*. - 如果不`null`，然後在`entitySetName`可以是*\<實體容器名稱 >*。*\<實體集名稱 >*或*\<實體集名稱 >*。If the is not `null`, then the `entitySetName` can be either *\*.*\* or *\*. 所附加的物件不需要具有相關聯的 。The object being attached is not required to have an associated with it. 如果物件沒有實體索引鍵，然後`entitySetName`不可為空字串。If the object does not have an entity key, then `entitySetName` cannot be an empty string. 如果要附加的物件具有和`entitySetName`具有值，然後在實體的索引鍵必須符合，找不到根據`entitySetName`和實體容器名稱。If the object being attached has an and `entitySetName` has a value, then the of the entity key must match the that was found based on the `entitySetName` and entity container name.

summary.span: 將物件標記為待刪除。

span.span: Marks an object for deletion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 將物件標記為待刪除。Marks an object for deletion from the . 呼叫 方法時，就會在資料來源中刪除此物件。The object is deleted in the data source when the method is called. 刪除父物件也會刪除條件約束關聯性中的所有子物件。Deleting the parent object also deletes all the child objects in the constrained relationship. 這個結果與在關聯性的關聯上啟用 `CascadeDelete` 屬性相同。This result is the same as enabling the `CascadeDelete` property on the association for the relationship. 已刪除的物件上呼叫方法。The method can be called on objects that are already deleted. ## Examples 這些範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 這個範例會建構特定 productid，使用資料來源中擷取產品物件的索引鍵，會刪除產品，並儲存變更到資料庫。This example constructs an with a specific ProductID, uses the key to retrieve a Product object from the data source, deletes the product, and saves the changes to the database. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#DeleteObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#deleteobject)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#DeleteObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#deleteobject)] 這個範例會刪除現有的訂單項目、 加入新項目，並將變更儲存到資料庫。This example deletes an existing order item, adds a new item, and saves the changes to the database. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#SaveChanges](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#savechanges)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#SaveChanges](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#savechanges)]

public: void Detach(System::Object ^ entity);

param.name: entity
param.span: 要中斷連結的物件。

span.span: Object to be detached.

param.span: 只會移除「實體」。如果有任何由相同 所追蹤的相關物件存在，這些物件將不會自動中斷連結。

summary.span: 從物件內容中移除物件。

span.span: Removes the object from the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從 中移除此物件。Removes the object from the . 這會停用該物件的變更追蹤和識別 (Identity) 解析。This disables change tracking and identity resolution for that object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). 呼叫 方法之後，系統將不再保留指向此物件的參考，而且可能會由記憶體回收行程收集這些參考。After the method is called, the system will no longer keep references that point to this object and it can be collected by the garbage collector. > [!NOTE] > 只有當使用者程式碼沒有已中斷連結物件的任何參考時，才可以進行記憶體回收。Garbage collection can only occur if the user code does not have any references to the detached object. 下列考量適用於中斷連結物件時：The following considerations apply when detaching objects: - 只會影響傳遞給此方法的特定物件。 only affects the specific object that is passed to the method. 如果中斷連結的物件在物件內容中有相關物件，這些物件並不會中斷連結。If the object being detached has related objects in the object context, those objects are not detached. - 中斷連結物件不會影響資料來源中的資料。Detaching objects does not affect data in the data source. - 在中斷連結作業期間，不會強制執行串聯 (Cascade) 刪除指示詞和參考條件約束 (Constraint)。Cascade delete directives and referential constraints are not enforced during a detach operation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[附加和卸離物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23). ## Examples [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#DetachObjects](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#detachobjects)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#DetachObjects](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#detachobjects)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它由 Entity Framework 所開啟，這個方法會關閉連接。This method closes the connection if it was opened by the Entity Framework. 之後呼叫時，需要開啟連接，例如執行查詢，或呼叫的作業方法，將會導致例外狀況。After is called, operations that require an open connection, such as executing a query or calling the method, will cause an exception. 不需要開啟連接的作業 (例如撰寫查詢或附加物件) 就不會導致例外狀況。Operations that do not require an open connection, such as composing a query or attaching objects, will not cause an exception. 方法不會關閉任何明確開啟的連接。The method does not close any explicitly opened connections. 限制的範圍內`using`區塊 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中) 可確保正確地處置資源。Limiting the scope of an within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic) ensures that resources are correctly disposed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[管理連接與交易](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6659d2a-9a45-4e98-acaa-d7a8029e5b99)。For more information, see [Managing Connections and Transactions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6659d2a-9a45-4e98-acaa-d7a8029e5b99). 方法呼叫`virtual`(`Overridable`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。The method calls the `virtual` (`Overridable` in Visual Basic) method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來執行預存程序或函式與資料來源中定義概念模型中表示的 helper 方法。The method is a helper method that is used to execute stored procedures or functions that are defined in the data source and expressed in the conceptual model. Entity Data Model 工具產生概念模型中的每個方法。The Entity Data Model tools generate a method for each in the conceptual model. 這些方法會呼叫強型別`ExecuteFunction`傳回具型別的。These methods call a strongly-typed `ExecuteFunction` to return a typed . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用預存程序 （一個架構） 的應用程式程式碼](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d13dd33f-fcf9-4e86-bd00-74bc31521536)。For more information, see [Application Code using Stored Procedures (Enity Framework)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d13dd33f-fcf9-4e86-bd00-74bc31521536). 參數陣列中必須有函式的所有參數，並針對匯入函式，包括的函式本身類型的中繼資料會檢查所有的型別。All parameters for the function are required in the parameters array and all types are checked against the metadata for the import function, including the type of the function itself. `null` CLR 實值型別允許值。`null` values are permitted for CLR value types. 參數驗證是由提供者執行的。Parameter validation is performed by the provider. 方法會使用值。The method uses the value of . 因此，如果物件已經存在物件內容中，它將不會載入資料來源。Therefore, if an object already exists in the object context, it will not be loaded from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用參數型命令 (Parameterized Command) 有助於防衛 SQL 插入式攻擊，在此類攻擊中，攻擊者會將命令「插入」至 SQL 陳述式而危及伺服器的安全。Using parameterized commands helps guard against SQL injection attacks, in which an attacker "injects" a command into a SQL statement that compromises security on the server. 參數化的命令會從外部來源接收的值會傳遞做為值，並不屬於 SQL 陳述式，以及確保所防衛 SQL 資料隱碼攻擊。Parameterized commands guard against a SQL injection attack by guaranteeing that values received from an external source are passed as values only, and not part of the SQL statement. 如此一來，在資料來源不會執行插入值的 SQL 命令。As a result, SQL commands inserted into a value are not executed at the data source. 而是只將其做為參數值評估。Rather, they are evaluated only as a parameter value. 除了安全性優點，參數化的命令會提供便利的方法，用來組織與 SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳遞的值。In addition to the security benefits, parameterized commands provide a convenient method for organizing values passed with a SQL statement or to a stored procedure. `parameters` 值可以是 物件的陣列或參數值的陣列。The `parameters` value can be an array of objects or an array of parameter values. 如果只有提供值時，陣列根據順序而定的值陣列中建立物件。If only values are supplied, an array of objects are created based on the order of the values in the array. 如果目前的交易存在目前的交易內容中執行存放區命令。The store command is executed in the context of the current transaction, if a current transaction exists. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱:For more information, see: [直接執行存放區命令](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d)和[Directly Executing Store Commands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d) and [如何： 直接執行命令，針對資料來源How to: Directly Execute Commands Against the Data Source](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/def3cc87-cfff-4dee-83cf-1a40c73a2d01)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用現有的連接來執行任意命令，直接針對資料來源。The method uses the existing connection to execute an arbitrary command directly against the data source. 如果此類交易存在，則會在目前交易的內容中執行存放區命令。The store command is executed in the context of the current transaction, if such a transaction exists. 呼叫 方法相當於呼叫 類別的 方法，只有 會傳回實體，而 會傳回 中的屬性值。Calling the method is equivalent to calling the method of the class, only returns entities and the returns property values in the . 呼叫與指定之實體集名稱，如果您想要追蹤結果。Call the with the specified entity set name, if you want for the results to be tracked. 呼叫方法來轉譯為實體物件的讀取器包含對應至指定的實體類型的資料列時。Call the method to translate a into entity objects when the reader contains data rows that map to the specified entity type. 使用參數型命令 (Parameterized Command) 有助於防衛 SQL 插入式攻擊，在此類攻擊中，攻擊者會將命令「插入」至 SQL 陳述式而危及伺服器的安全。Using parameterized commands helps guard against SQL injection attacks, in which an attacker "injects" a command into a SQL statement that compromises security on the server. 參數化的命令會從外部來源接收的值會傳遞做為值，並不屬於 SQL 陳述式，以及確保所防衛 SQL 資料隱碼攻擊。Parameterized commands guard against a SQL injection attack by guaranteeing that values received from an external source are passed as values only, and not part of the SQL statement. 如此一來，在資料來源不會執行插入值的 SQL 命令。As a result, SQL commands inserted into a value are not executed at the data source. 而是只將其做為參數值評估。Rather, they are evaluated only as a parameter value. 除了安全性優點，參數化的命令會提供便利的方法，用來組織與 SQL 陳述式或預存程序傳遞的值。In addition to the security benefits, parameterized commands provide a convenient method for organizing values passed with a SQL statement or to a stored procedure. `parameters` 值可以是 物件的陣列或參數值的陣列。The `parameters` value can be an array of objects or an array of parameter values. 如果只有提供值時，陣列根據順序而定的值陣列中建立物件。If only values are supplied, an array of objects are created based on the order of the values in the array. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱:For more information, see: [直接執行存放區命令](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d)和[Directly Executing Store Commands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5708d0a2-3f76-4825-978a-d06ff5c4bb3d) and [如何： 直接執行命令，針對資料來源How to: Directly Execute Commands Against the Data Source](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/def3cc87-cfff-4dee-83cf-1a40c73a2d01)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須呼叫方法，以達到明確載入，當您使用 POCO 自訂資料類別。The method must be called to achieve explicit loading when you are using POCO custom data classes. 在呼叫，相關的物件可以透過來源實體的導覽屬性來存取。After calling , the related object can be accessed through the navigation properties of the source entity. 要載入之屬性由 LINQ 運算式指定，必須為簡單的屬性成員存取，格式為`(entity) => entity.PropertyName`，其中*PropertyName*會傳回要載入相關的物件的導覽屬性。The property to load is specified by a LINQ expression, which must be in the form of a simple property member access, as in `(entity) => entity.PropertyName`, where *PropertyName* is the navigation property that returns the related objects to be loaded. 如果使用其他形式的 LINQ 運算式，會發生例外狀況。An exception will occur if other forms of the LINQ expression are used. 當使用 POCO 自訂資料類別，相關的物件不能明確地載入像 Entity Data Model 工具所產生的實體類型的執行個體。When using POCO custom data classes, related objects cannot be explicitly loaded like instances of entity types that are generated by the Entity Data Model tools. 這是因為這些工具會產生導覽屬性會傳回或相關物件時上呼叫。This is because the tools generate the navigation properties that return an or of related objects when is called on a . POCO 實體仍然可以藉由使用消極式載入設定載入屬性`true`的執行個體上所傳回屬性，或使用積極式載入與方法.POCO entities can still be loaded by using lazy loading by setting the property to `true` on the instance of that is returned by the property, or by using eager loading with the method on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法具有雙重用途：允許使用資料來源中的資料來重新整理物件內容中的物件，以及成為用以解決衝突的機制。This method has the dual purpose of allowing objects in the object context to be refreshed with data from the data source, and being the mechanism by which conflicts can be resolved. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 重新整理物件的順序不具決定性。The order in which objects are refreshed is nondeterministic. 呼叫 方法之後，雖然系統一定會使用資料來源的值來更新物件的原始值，但是不一定會使用資料來源的值來更新目前的值。After is called, the object’s original values will always be updated with the data source value, but the current values might or might not be updated with the data source value. 這會因 值而不同。This depends on the value. 模式表示應該更新在集合中的物件，以符合資料來源的值。The mode means that the objects in the collection should be updated to match the data source values. 表示物件內容中的變更會保存，即使已有其他變更資料來源中。 means that only the changes in the object context will be persisted, even if there have been other changes in the data source. 若要確保物件已經由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以在呼叫 方法之後，使用 來呼叫 。To ensure that objects have been updated by data source-side logic, you can call with after you call the method.

summary.span: 使用資料來源中的資料，更新物件內容中的物件。

span.span: Updates an object in the object context with data from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有雙重用途：允許使用資料來源中的資料來重新整理物件，以及成為用以解決衝突的機制。 has the dual purpose of allowing an object to be refreshed with data from the data source and being the mechanism by which conflicts can be resolved. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 重新整理物件的順序不具決定性。The order in which objects are refreshed is nondeterministic. 呼叫 方法之後，雖然系統一定會使用資料來源的值來更新物件的原始值，但是不一定會使用資料來源的值來更新目前的值。After the method is called, the object’s original values will always be updated with the data source value, but the current values might or might not be updated with the data source value. 這會因 而不同。This depends on the . 模式表示此物件應該更新為符合資料來源的值。The mode means that the object should be updated to match the data source values. 值表示只會保存物件內容中的變更，即使資料來源中已經有其他變更也一樣。The value means that only the changes in the object context will be persisted, even if there have been other changes in the data source. 若要確保物件已經由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以在呼叫 方法之後，使用 值來呼叫 方法。To ensure that an object has been updated by data source-side logic, you can call the method with the value after you call the method. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會嘗試儲存變更，而且這可能會導致並行衝突。The example tries to save changes, and this may cause a concurrency conflict. 然後，它會示範如何透過重新整理物件內容，然後重新儲存變更，解決並行衝突。Then it shows how to resolve the concurrency conflict by refreshing the object context before re-saving changes. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Concurrency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#concurrency)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Concurrency](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#concurrency)]

summary.span: 將所有更新保存至資料來源並且重設物件內容中的變更追蹤。

span.span: Persists all updates to the data source and resets change tracking in the object context.

returns.span: 呼叫 時處於 、 或 狀態中的物件數目。

span.span: The number of objects in an , , or state when was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要確保用戶端的物件已經由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以在呼叫 之後，使用 值來呼叫 方法。To ensure that objects on the client have been updated by data source-side logic, you can call the method with the value after you call . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[儲存的變更和管理並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 在交易內的運作方式。 operates within a transaction. 將會回復該交易，並擲回例外狀況，如果任何一個中途無法保存物件。 will roll back that transaction and throw an exception if any of the dirty objects cannot be persisted. 如果已經發生開放式並行存取違規，就會擲回 。If an optimistic concurrency violation has occurred, an is thrown. 您可以透過攔截開放式並行存取違規、使用 或 值來呼叫 方法，然後再次呼叫 ，解決開放式並行存取違規。You can resolve an optimistic concurrency violation by catching it, calling the method with the or value, and then calling again. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 管理物件內容中的資料並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a)。For more information, see [How to: Manage Data Concurrency in the Object Context](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a). ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 這個範例會嘗試儲存可能導致並行衝突的變更。This example tries to save changes, which may cause a concurrency conflict. 然後，它會示範如何透過重新整理物件內容，然後重新儲存變更，解決並行衝突。Then, it demonstrates how to resolve the concurrency conflict by refreshing the object context before re-saving changes. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Concurrency](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#concurrency)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#Concurrency](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#concurrency)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個特定的多載可能是確保之前，您將變更儲存至資料來源或是呼叫稱為之後您將變更儲存至資料來源。Use this specific overload of to either make sure that is called before you save changes to the data source or that is called after you save changes to the data source. 這個列舉型別的，允許其成員值的位元組合。This enumeration has a that allows for a bitwise combination of its member values. 若要確定用戶端上的物件，已由資料來源端邏輯所更新，您可以呼叫方法值之後呼叫。To make sure that objects on the client have been updated by data source-side logic, you can call the method with the value after you call . 方法可在交易中運作。The method operates in a transaction. 將會回復該交易，並擲回例外狀況，如果任何一個中途無法保存物件。 will roll back that transaction and throw an exception if any one of the dirty objects cannot be persisted. 如果已經發生開放式並行存取違規，就會擲回 。If an optimistic concurrency violation has occurred, an is thrown. 您可以透過攔截開放式並行存取違規、使用 或 值來呼叫 方法，然後再次呼叫 方法，解決開放式並行存取違規。You can resolve an optimistic concurrency violation by catching it, calling the method with the or values, and then calling the method again. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 管理物件內容中的資料並行](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a)。For more information, see [How to: Manage Data Concurrency in the Object Context](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/25ffe70d-ce97-4f0a-8ae0-22b7c40f748a).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會針對 在 作業的開頭引發。The event is raised at the start of a operation on an . 這個事件通常是在新值寫入資料庫之前，用來驗證變更的物件。This event is typically used to validate changed objects before new values are written to the database. ## Examples 這個範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。This example is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 這會針對執行實體狀態驗證的 事件註冊處理常式。This registers a handler for the event that performs entity state validation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會嘗試從 擷取具有指定之 的物件。 tries to retrieve an object that has the specified from the . 如果此物件目前尚未載入物件內容中，系統就會執行查詢，以便嘗試從資料來源中傳回此物件。If the object is currently not loaded into the object context, a query is executed in an attempt to return the object from the data source. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[物件查詢](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276)。For more information, see [Object Queries](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0768033c-876f-471d-85d5-264884349276). 您可以使用 方法來避免處理找不到此物件時， 所引發的 。Use the method to avoid handling the raised by when the object cannot be found. 這個方法將會傳回處於 狀態中的物件。This method will return objects in the state. 暫存索引鍵無法用來從資料來源中傳回物件。A temporary key cannot be used to return an object from the data source. 方法適用於標準.NET`TryParse`圖樣方法，傳回`false`時攔截。The method applies the standard .NET `TryParse` pattern for the method, returning `false` when the is caught. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會針對給定型別的實體建立 ，然後嘗試依據索引鍵擷取實體。The example creates an for an entity of the given type and then tries to retrieve an entity by key.
